techmeme.title: Microsoft releases a patch for a SharePoint 0-day RCE flaw exploited globally on thousands of on-prem servers, says updates for SharePoint 2016 are in the works (Bloomberg)
Dating apps are encouraging users to meet in person to address concerns about "dating fatigue" among Gen Z and reverse a post-pandemic slowdown in growth (Kieran Smith/Financial Times)
A look at the video podcasting surge; study: ~75% of podcast consumers play video episodes and ~30% play video episodes minimized or in background mode (Joseph Bernstein/New York Times)
Sources: the UK may backtrack on its January order for Apple to create a backdoor for iCloud encrypted data after pressure from US officials, including JD Vance (Financial Times)
Global hack on Microsoft product hits U.S., state agencies, researchers say (Washington Post)
